member.summary: The target type command line commands.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.JScript.Autoref
member.summary: Automatically reference assemblies based on imported namespaces and fully-qualified names (on by default).

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.JScript.Fast
member.summary: Disable language features to allow better code generation.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.JScript.NoStandardLib
member.summary: Do not import standard library (mscorlib.dll) and change autoref default to off.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Build.JScript.Platform
member.summary: Limit which platforms this code can run on; must be x86, Itanium, x64, or anycpu, which is the default.
